title: ARC Vegan Cafe
description: A 100% vegan cafe sponsored and run by the local non profit AR group ARC (Awakening Respect and Compassion for all sentient beings). Cost is suggested donation of $15-$20 for a complete buffet meal. Students eat for $12. Children eat for $5. Food served from 6-7:30pm, followed by screening of AR friendly film or speaker. The cafe takes place inside Plantation Antique Galleries (604 Bel Air Blvd).
